attributes.action: Make it law under the disability act for garages to supply courtesy cars fitted with hand controls
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present there is a lack if any of garages that will supply a disabled driver a courtesy car fitted with hand controls.These can be fitted for about £400 which is not a huge dent in garage profits.I believe this could be against the disability rights law
